properties.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 1 at 3:56PM PST until February 3 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Areas of northwest to north winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts
up to 50 mph expected.

* WHERE...Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los
Angeles, Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands and San Gabriel
Valley.

* WHEN...From 8 PM Sunday to noon PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Trees and powerlines could be blown down and a few power
outages may result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds Sunday night across western
portions of Catalina Island, the western portions of the LA
coast, including Malibu to Hollywood Hills, and foothills of
the San Gabriel Valley.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SUNDAY TO NOON PST MONDAY
